note:
Policy wonk. Street photographer. Torontonian. Not necessarily in that order.

Focuses: privacy, national security, artificial intelligence, accountability, democratic governance. He/him/his.

Posts should be attributed to me and do not necessarily represent the groups I work with or organizations that employ me.

My posts self-destruct and should not be regarded as stable URLs.
